SENT.plain: CTL are thought to play a role in the elimination of transformed cells in vivo
The effectiveness of such CTL is in part dependent on recognition of tumor specific antigens
Among the best characterized tumor-specific antigens are the unique or idiotypic determinants on the Ig of B cell lymphomas
Here we describe the generation and properties of human CTL specific for the idiotype on autologous B cell tumors
These cells are CD3+,CD4-,CD8- and express the delta chain of the TCR
Such cells may prove useful in tumor-specific adoptive therapy
